mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') AS UPDATE_DATE, P.ITEMS_NO,ITEMS_NAME , ROUND(AVG(PRICE)) AS AVG_PRICE FROM PRICES P INNER JOIN ITEMS I ON P.ITEMS_NO = I.ITEMS_NO WHERE UPDATE_DATE = (SELECT MAX(UPDATE_DATE) FROM PRICES WHERE ITEMS_NO = #{itemsNo}) AND P.ITEMS_NO = #{itemsNo} GROUP BY UPDATE_DATE, P.ITEMS_NO,ITEMS_NAME ORDER BY ITEMS_NO
